data.text: Inside London’s iconic ‘Walkie-Talkie’ building you can find one of our absolute favourite hidden spots: a sky garden on the top floor, which offers one of the most fantastic views of the city you can get. Ready to check it out? Grab your ticket now! 👉 https://t.co/AeMNWOJWFF https://t.co/BxbUncUvJX

data.text: Our favourite thing about flying is that it feels like flying.   ✈️

data.text: Have you ever wanted to hang out of the window of a cockpit? This unique opportunity is reserved only for #WIZZCaptain Andreea Litescu and her colleagues. 👩‍✈️ Apply for our open pilot positions to try it out yourself! 👉 https://t.co/8QzEoaoaza https://t.co/ZjHbyQpLZm
Golden hour photos are a lowkey flex on their own. Taking them next to an aircraft though? That's just cheeky! Shout-out to #WIZZAmbassador Adrianna for this pic! 🌅 https://t.co/u2VDSlgOCR

Any filmmakers looking for amazing mountains for an epic scene? ⛰️ We got you! 👊

data.text:
Only 1 day left to secure a seat on our most exciting flight yet. Here's how to apply:
1️⃣ Follow our Instagram
2️⃣ Have a public profile
3️⃣ Post a photo of your most adventurous journey
4️⃣ Use #GetLostwithWIZZ and @wizzair 
Rules and terms 👉 https://t.co/UNna0Niwqg https://t.co/tLrcySGBJB

urls.title: Ready to Fly | EASA
urls.description: As Europeans start their summer holidays, and air travel rebuilds after the start of the COVID-19 pandemic, not every journey has been as smooth as wished for. Getting back to pre-COVID-19 air travel volumes is a complex task and EASA is working with airlines, airports and industry to ensure flying remains safe despite these challenges.

data.text: We're collaborating with EASA to maximize your chances for a smooth journey with WIZZ. Please check in ahead, save your boarding passes, and arrive 2-3 hours before boarding. Stay tuned for our top tips or find out more at: https://t.co/DUpJonLRlb https://t.co/xfsyo7fKn3

data.text:
WIZZ is proud to have the youngest, most sustainable fleet* in Europe with 4.75 years on average, compared to the 8-9 years of our low-cost competitors. See for yourself!
#flythegreenest 👉 https://t.co/XOY2mlp5a8

*among European competitor airlines with 50+ aircraft https://t.co/tSsrtdv5bm

urls.title: WIZZ – Dream more. Live more. Be more.
urls.description: Fly with Europe's greenest ultra-low cost airline. Friendly service, low fares and lots of destinations.

data.text: Staying up-to-date throughout your travel journey is more important today than ever before. Book directly through the WIZZ app or https://t.co/AeMNWOJWFF to get all the latest news on travel restrictions, requirements, flight details, unexpected changes & rebook options in time! https://t.co/sZ9yoRS6CM
That is the face of someone who has just landed an aircraft so smoothly that his passengers didn't even realise they were already on the ground. ✈️ 🧑‍✈️ https://t.co/U0MO5t1YmU

urls.title: Ready to Fly | EASA
urls.description: As Europeans start their summer holidays, and air travel rebuilds after the start of the COVID-19 pandemic, not every journey has been as smooth as wished for. Getting back to pre-COVID-19 air travel volumes is a complex task and EASA is working with airlines, airports and industry to ensure flying remains safe despite these challenges.

data.text: We're collaborating with EASA on their Ready to Fly (Check, Know, Think - Go!) campaign to maximize your chances of a smooth journey with WIZZ this summer. Stay tuned for our top tips or find out more at: https://t.co/DUpJoo3sJL https://t.co/nKcwJXTF3S
When you squeeze in a power nap on your 5 AM flight. Sweet dreams, safe journey! #WIZZfleck https://t.co/i41qrKSkCR

Reach for the skies, they say. ☁️ Well, we're doing exactly that. In June 2022, we carried a record 4.34 million passengers. 🏆 Compared to last year, that's a 179% increase! ✨ We're super proud and motivated to keep doing what we do best! https://t.co/6M1J9kv15m

urls.title: Wizz Air (@wizzair) • Instagram photo
urls.description: Wizz Air shared a post on Instagram: "GET LOST WITH WIZZ 🎉 Hey, Abu Dhabi, it's time to step into the unknown! Want to travel with us to a destination you know nothing about, only that it might become the experience of your life? Simply follow our Instagram page, and post a photo of your most adventurous travel experience on your public Instagram profile using the hashtag #GetLostwithWIZZ and the tag @wizzair for a chance to secure a seat for you and your partner on our mystery flight! Let's get lost together! Apply till 7 August! Check out the rules and terms here 👉 link in bio The promotion only applies to residents of the UAE.". Follow their account to see 5277 posts.

data.text:
Are you ready to board a flight to the unknown? Apply now!

For more details, click: https://t.co/M1WZT2fBeX https://t.co/qlOWffjfff

data.text: Aaaand pencils down! ✏️ School's over, holiday's in session! 🏖️ Get 20% OFF on 500.000 seats on selected flights to or from the UK today and go on that family holiday you've been waiting for! 🇬🇧 Grab your ticket now and travel until 30 September 2022! 👉 https://t.co/AeMNWOJWFF https://t.co/oRvSfUhpGJ

data.text:
Flight cancelled? Choose between rebooking to another Wizz Air flight free of charge, requesting a 120% credit refund to your WIZZ account or getting a full cash refund.

For more information, visit: Delay and Cancellation (https://t.co/AeMNWOJWFF) https://t.co/Ng8EjQvU6R

urls.title: Aviation & Airline Jobs | Job Search | Wizz Air
urls.description: Explore aviation & airline job opportunities with Wizz Air, Europe's fastest growing low cost airline. Easily search pilot, cabin crew & office jobs with our careers portal.

data.text: Apply to become a Cabin Crew member at WIZZ and be the superhero our passengers need! 👉 https://t.co/vwPYbteM7G https://t.co/I3Q6MJAdRV

Last Friday on our flight from London Luton to Warsaw we welcomed on board Jonathan, who has been travelling with WIZZ since 2009 and on 15 July had his 1000th flight with us. The least we could do is invite him to the flight deck to celebrate this incredible milestone! 🥳 https://t.co/Sc1TOjfo2o

urls.title: WIZZ – Dream more. Live more. Be more.
urls.description: Fly with Europe's greenest ultra-low cost airline. Friendly service, low fares and lots of destinations.

data.text: Do you want to say "hasta la vista" to your work troubles and enjoy a change of scenery? Check out our direct flights from London to one of the many holiday destinations in our network. 👉👉 https://t.co/AeMNWOJWFF https://t.co/Uf4AOjDNy1

domain.name: Cities
domain.description: Cities around the world

data.text: Our 160th aircraft has landed – please welcome our newest addition to the young and modern fleet of WIZZ! We aim to triple this number while also reducing our environmental footprint. Can't wait to take more and more of you to the destinations of your dreams! https://t.co/LBzAxSBEgM

NEW ROUTES FROM ABU DHABI 🇦🇪
So, here's something new... with WIZZ you can now discover the unrivalled white-sand beaches and the astonishing underwater world of the Maldives or the hidden cultural gems of Kuwait! Don't miss the chance to explore something new from Abu Dhabi! https://t.co/QZ4oA2Htwd

To the moon and back! 🌕 Okay, we don't fly that far (yet:)), but it's International Moon Day and we thought these amazing shots of our Airbus are the perfect way to celebrate the occasion! ✈️ https://t.co/gIV5Enij6K

urls.title: WIZZ – Dream more. Live more. Be more.
urls.description: Fly with Europe's greenest ultra-low cost airline. Friendly service, low fares and lots of destinations.

data.text: Actions are best when they're direct. Just like flights. Why? Because they’re more sustainable: no connecting flights means no extra fuel-burn. Check out this video to find out why WIZZ is your greenest choice of air travel. #flythegreenest 👉 https://t.co/XOY2mlp5a8 https://t.co/7FaLDrP56G
